mapper.select: SELECT ID , DETAIL_NAME , PRICE , REG_DTS , MOD_DTS FROM FACE_SECTION_DETAIL
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO FACE_SECTION_DETAIL FSD USING( SELECT #{id} AS ID , #{detailName} AS DETAIL_NAME , #{price} AS PRICE , SYSDATE AS MOD_DTS FROM DUAL ) A ON (FSD.ID = A.ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET , DETAIL_NAME = A.DETAIL_NAME , PRICE = A.PRICE MOD_DTS = SYDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( ID, DETAIL_NAME, PRICE, REG_DTS, MOD_DTS ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ID), 0) FROM FACE_SECTION_DETAIL) , A.DETAIL_NAME , A.PRICE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE )
